sen.j: 大浦半島（おおうらはんとう）は京都府北部と福井県若狭地方にまたがって、若狭湾に突き出た半島。
sen.e: Extending over the northern part of Kyoto Prefecture & Wakasa area of Fukui Prefecture, Oura Peninsula projects into Wakasa Bay.
Extending over the northern part of Kyoto Prefecture & Wakasa area of Fukui Prefecture, Oura Peninsula projects into Wakasa Bay.
Extending over the northern part of Kyoto Prefecture and Wakasa area of Fukui Prefecture, Oura Peninsula projects into Wakasa Bay.

sen.j: 大浦半島は京都府舞鶴市の一部と福井県高浜町の一部にまたがっており、福井県側には関西電力の高浜原子力発電所が立地している。
sen.e: To be more exact, Oura Peninsula extends over a part of Maizuru City in Kyoto Prefecture & a part of Takahama-cho in Fukui Prefecture, and there stands Takahama Nuclear Power Plant operated by the Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc, on the side of Fukui Prefecture.

To be more exact, Oura Peninsula extends over a part of Maizuru City in Kyoto Prefecture & a part of Takahama-cho in Fukui Prefecture, where the Takahama Nuclear Power Plant operated by the Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc, on the side of Fukui Prefecture is located.

To be more exact, Oura Peninsula extends over a part of Maizuru City in Kyoto Prefecture and a part of Takahama-cho in Fukui Prefecture, where the Takahama Nuclear Power Plant operated by the Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc. on the side of Fukui Prefecture is located.

sen.j: また京都府側には竜宮浜海水浴場と野原海水浴場があり、また若狭湾国定公園に指定され風光明媚なことから、主に夏季には観光客で賑わう。
sen.e: On the side of Kyoto Prefecture, there exist Ryuguhama Seaside Resort & Nohara Seaside Resort, and there is beautiful scenery designated as Wakasa Bay Quasi-national Park, so many tourists visit here mainly during the summer season.

To be more exact, Oura Peninsula extends over a part of Maizuru City in Kyoto Prefecture & a part of Takahama-cho in Fukui Prefecture, where the Takahama Nuclear Power Plant operated by the Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc, on the side of Fukui Prefecture is located.

On the side of Kyoto Prefecture is the Ryuguhama Seaside Resort and Nohara Seaside Resort, with beautiful scenery designated as Wakasa Bay Quasi-National Park, resulting in many tourists visiting the area mainly during the summer season.

sen.j: 半島基部の京都府側には、西国三十三箇所第29番の松尾寺 (舞鶴市)がある。
sen.e: At the foot of the Oura Peninsula on the side of Kyoto Prefecture, there exists Matsuo-dera Temple (in Maizuru City), which is the twenty-nineth temple of "Saigoku-Sanjusankasho" (33 temples in the Kinki region).

At the foot of the Oura Peninsula on the side of Kyoto Prefecture, there exists Matsuo-dera Temple (in Maizuru City), which is the twenty-nineth temple of "Saigoku-Sanjusankasho" (33 temples in the Kinki region).
At the foot of the Oura Peninsula on the side of Kyoto Prefecture, there exists Matsuo-dera Temple (Maizuru City), which is No. 29 pilgrim stamp office of the 33 Temples of Saigoku.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。スペルを修正しました。"the twenty-ninth temple of "Saigoku-Sanjusankasho" (thirty-three temples in the Kinki region) " -> "No. 29 pilgrim stamp office of the 33 Temples of Saigoku"

sen.j: 北端が成生岬、北西端が博奕岬。
sen.e: The northern edge is Naryu-zaki Cape, and the northwestern edge is Bakuchi-misaki Cape.
The northern edge is Naryu-zaki Cape, and the northwestern edge is Bakuchi-misaki Cape.
The northern edge is Naryu-zaki Cape, and the northwestern edge is Bakuchi-misaki Cape.

sen.j: 半島の南西に舞鶴湾を囲い込む。
sen.e: And Oura Peninsula holds Maizuru Bay in its arm in the direction of its southwest.
And Oura Peninsula holds Maizuru Bay in its arm in the direction of its southwest.
And Oura Peninsula holds Maizuru Bay in its arm in the direction of its southwest.
